discussion.p: /1 should be updated to mention async.
/1 should also be updated for async. That paragraph also says
discussion.blockquote: ... Its value or exception can be set by use of a shared_future, promise (), or packaged_task () object that shares the same associated state.
discussion.p: How can the value be set by a shared_future?
discussion.blockquote: An atomic_future object can only be created by use of a promise () or packaged_task () object.
discussion.p: which is wrong, it's created from a std::future, which could have been default-constructed. That paragraph should be closer to the text of /1, and should also mention async.
